content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Expand your NARUTO SHIPPUDEN™: Ultimate Ninja® STORM 4 journey with the season pass! Get access to the three NARUTO SHIPPUDEN™: Ultimate Ninja® STORM 4 add-on packs at a discounted price and receive an exclusive secret combination technique with the release of the first DLC. In addition, get early access to each of the 3 DLC packs ahead of the official release dates!

Includes:
- Sub-scenarios to expand your adventure (worth several hours of extra gameplay)
- Combination techniques*
- Costumes
- Ninja Info Cards
- Matching Voice
- Costumes from previous Naruto games
- Extra playable characters

*One of the Secret Techniques can’t be used unless obtaining pre-order bonus content.

NARUTO SHIPPUDEN™: Ultimate Ninja® STORM 4 game required sold separately.



Additional hardware required for Remote Play.

1-2 players
Network Players 2-8
DUALSHOCK®4
Remote Play
1080p HD Video Output

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
